Name: TutorialTitle100
Text_English: Clear the first dungeon
Text_Korean: 0 清除第一個地牢

Name: TutorialStep100_0
Text_English: It's time for your first mission. First, press the Battle button.
Text_Korean:
哦！你是通過考試的那個人嗎？
我有點擔心她現在的樣子，但是... .首先，我將引導您進行冒險。

Name: TutorialStep100_1
Text_English: Luemos is surrounded by strange darkness. Press Stage 1-1.
Text_Korean: 現在，Ruemos 地區還不錯。我們需要找出發生了什麼。我們要進入<span color="#eec178">第一道門</>嗎？

Name: TutorialStep100_2
Text_English: You need to satisfy certain conditions to fully clear a dungeon!
Text_Korean: 如果您滿足以下條件，您將獲得成功征服地牢的令牌。收集所有 <span color="#eec178">Star</> 令牌。

Name: TutorialStep100_3
Text_English: You can check the rewards for clearing the dungeon here.
Text_Korean: 如果戰鬥沒有<span color="#eec178">reward</>怎麼辦？這是為贏得一場激烈的戰鬥而獲得的<span color="#eec178">獎勵</>，因此請務必查看。

Name: TutorialStep100_4
Text_English: Now, let's go to the combat page. Press the Ready Battle button.
Text_Korean:
縝密的準備是戰鬥勝利的捷徑。
準備戰鬥，好嗎？

Name: TutorialStep100_5
Text_English: Here, you can choose the characters needed for the battle.
Text_Korean: 您可以<span color="#eec178">選擇</><span color="#eec178">英雄</>參與戰鬥。為所有英雄的成長給予平等的參與機會是好事。

Name: TutorialStep100_6
Text_English: This function can help you proceed more easily. It becomes available after you acquire three stars for clearing the dungeon.
Text_Korean:
這是一項允許您重複地下城或投資獎勵的功能。當您獲得
3 星 時，您可以使用它。

Name: TutorialStep100_7
Text_English: Enter the dungeon quickly by pressing the Start Battle button!
Text_Korean:
呵呵，我很擔心，因為我將來有很多要解釋的。
戰鬥並變得強大。

Name: TutorialTitle200
Text_English: Skill
Text_Korean: 技能

Name: TutorialDesc200
Text_English: 1-1 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-1 清除

Name: TutorialStep200_0
Text_English: Press here to open your Skill Management menu.
Text_Korean: 什麼？你很快通過了第一道門。我必須教你如何變得更強壯。嘗試單擊 <span color="#eec178">集成菜單</>。

Name: TutorialStep200_1
Text_English: Enter the Skill menu.
Text_Korean: 英雄變強的方法有很多。這一次，我將介紹<span color="#eec178">技能</>。嘗試按 <span color="#eec178">技能</>。

Name: TutorialStep200_2
Text_English: You can check your skill information here! You can use more powerful skills by leveling up!
Text_Korean: 你可以在這裡查看技能信息！當<span color="#eec178">技能等級</>增加時，力量增加並增加動作。

Name: TutorialStep200_3
Text_English: You need SP to upgrade your skills. You can purchase SP if you need more.
Text_Korean: 您需要 <span color="#eec178">Points</> 來升級技能。英雄等級提升時可以獲得，如果不夠，可以通過<span color="#eec178">購買積分</>獲得。

Name: TutorialStep200_4
Text_English: You can switch skills when you reach Level 20. Create a combination that fits your battles best.
Text_Korean: 當英雄達到<span color="#eec178">20級</>時，<span color="#eec178">裝備技能</>可以<span color="#eec178">改變</>。也可以保存，所以你可以根據戰鬥配置自己的技能。

Name: TutorialStep200_5
Text_English: Now, let's find out about the unification skill!
Text_Korean:
你知道粘合技巧嗎？這是非常重要的信息。
仔細聽。

Name: TutorialStep200_6
Text_English: Cohesion skill is the most powerful. You can grow through various missions!
Text_Korean: 結合技能是一種強大的技能，可以喚醒英雄之間團結的力量的光之力量。可以通過<span color="#eec178">綁定任務</>來加強。

Name: TutorialStep200_7
Text_English:
Press and hold the heroes’ portraits to see the
Unity Mission and Achievement Reward for unlocking their Unity Skills.
Text_Korean:
點擊英雄頭像，可以查看
綁定任務和成就獎勵，增強團結技能。

Name: TutorialStep200_8
Text_English: Completing the heroes’ Unity Missions will <span color=”#eec178”>unlock</> the <span color=”#eec178”>Unity Skill</> for use.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">耦合技能</>的<span color="#eec178">效果</>隨著你完成英雄聯合任務而變得更強。

Name: TutorialStep200_9
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean:
這是最強大和最豐富多彩的技能，所以一定要發展它。
讓我們回到大廳準備戰鬥。

Name: TutorialTitle300
Text_English: Item store
Text_Korean: 設備店

Name: TutorialDesc300
Text_English: 1-2 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-2 清除

Name: TutorialStep300_0
Text_English: Press here to open the Store menu!
Text_Korean:
現在是時候拿到你的裝備了。
那我們去器材店好嗎？

Name: TutorialStep300_1
Text_English: You can use gems to acquire equipment. Try opening the gem box.
Text_Korean:
如果您支付 寶石，您可以打開寶箱並獲得 裝備。
我把我的預付款作為回報，所以不要擔心，打開它。

Name: TutorialStep300_2
Text_English: Select the hero's equipment type before summoning an item.
Text_Korean: 您可以<span color="#eec178">選擇</>您想將裝備交給哪個<span color="#eec178">英雄</>。這並不是說這裡不是出售任何東西的地方。

Name: TutorialStep300_3
Text_English: Let me stop here. Go back to the lobby and prepare for more battles.
Text_Korean:
為了回報您為世界而戰，我們會定期提前預付預付款，所以請您訪問商店並獲取您的裝備。
到時見。

Name: TutorialTitle600
Text_English: Bag
Text_Korean: 裝備升級

Name: TutorialDesc600
Text_English: 1-4 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-4 清除

Name: TutorialStep600_0
Text_English: Click the Integration menu.
Text_Korean:
我差點忘瞭如果你有裝備，升級是必不可少的。
打開裝備箱。怦怦直跳。

Name: TutorialStep600_1
Text_English: Press your equipped weapon to check information.
Text_Korean: 好吧，我還沒有吃飽。稍後會滿，所以現在，讓我們點擊<span color="#eec178">Ready Weapon</>查看信息。

Name: TutorialStep600_2
Text_English: Press the Level Up button.
Text_Korean: 這些是增加設備功率的方法。您還可以更改更高級別設備的選項。這次嘗試<span color="#eec178">升級</>。

Name: TutorialStep600_3
Text_English: Here, you can find information to upgrade your equipment.
Text_Korean: 您可以查看與升級相關的信息。如果您添加<span color="#eec178">Ingredient</>，您可以看到積累的經驗和改進的統計數據。

Name: TutorialStep600_4
Text_English: Don't worry. I have the level-up ingredients for you today.
Text_Korean: 這具慷慨付出的身體，這次又準備了<span color="#eec178">升級材料</>，所以不要害怕繼續。

Name: TutorialStep600_5
Text_English: Select ingredients and level up your item.
Text_Korean: 現在你已經選擇了材料，你是否可以通過點擊<span color="#eec178">升級按鈕</>來升級你的裝備？試試吧。怦怦直跳。

Name: TutorialStep600_6
Text_English: That a great rate of increase. If it goes up this much I will do it too.... I'm talking to myself. Press the <span color="#eec178">X button to see if it is installed.
Text_Korean: 這是一次不錯的攀登。如果漲到這麼多，我會這樣做... .我在自言自語。按 <span color="#eec178">X 按鈕</>查看您的庫存。

Name: TutorialStep600_7
Text_English: I made high-level equipment  so I will try to install it. Press the <span color="#eec178">Automatic Installation </> button at the bottom.
Text_Korean: 我們製作了高級裝備，所以讓我們嘗試裝備它。嘗試點擊底部的 <span color="#eec178">Auto Fit</> 按鈕。

Name: TutorialStep600_8
Text_English: <span color="#eec178">Automatic installation </> is a convenient function to put on high-performance equipment. Now let us put on the gear.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">自動裝備</>是裝備高級裝備的便捷功能。所以現在讓我們戴上裝備。

Name: TutorialStep600_9
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 裝備說明已經結束，準備下一次冒險吧。冒險困難的時候，別忘了<span color="#eec178">裝備升級</>。

Name: TutorialTitle400
Text_English: Team control
Text_Korean: 職業

Name: TutorialDesc400
Text_English: 1-3 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-3 清除

Name: TutorialStep400_0
Text_English: Now that you've become stronger, it's time to fight as a team. Press the PvP button.
Text_Korean: 是時候學習如何與其他同志並肩作戰了。嘗試按下 <span color="#eec178">決鬥按鈕</>。

Name: TutorialStep400_1
Text_English: Go to Team Control.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">征服</>是一場訓練戰士與新面孔組隊的戰鬥。進來

Name: TutorialStep400_2
Text_English: A team control match requires your team to take the target area against the opposing team!
Text_Korean: 征服戰爭是一場戰鬥，您屬於紅隊和藍隊之一，並<span color="#eec178">佔領</>中央<span color="#eec178">根據地</>。我的建議是記住<span color="#eec178">中央野獸</>。

Name: TutorialStep400_3
Text_English: A monthly seasonal reward is given according to your rank. Try to increase your rank!
Text_Korean: 每<span color="#eec178">每週</>會根據你的排名獲得<span color="#eec178">賽季獎勵</>，所以盡量獲得高排名吧。那麼你的聲望也會增加。

Name: TutorialStep400_4
Text_English: You can acquire upgrade scrolls by winning a team control match.
Text_Korean: 這是最重要的信息。每次贏得征服戰爭，您都可以獲得<span color="#eec178">經驗</>和<span color="#eec178">強化捲軸</>來強化你的裝備。

Name: TutorialStep400_5
Text_English: The best player of the team that won the match will receive a key that is used to open MVP boxes.
Text_Korean: 特別是，獲勝隊伍中表現最出色的一位英雄將獲得<span color="#eec178">鑰匙</>打開<span color="#eec178">MVP盒</>。

Name: TutorialStep400_6
Text_English: Match rewards are given according to wins before losing three times. So, try to obtain higher win points!
Text_Korean: 征服戰爭3次失敗前獲得的勝利點數反映在<span color="#eec178">決鬥箱</>中來決定獎勵，所以要收集大量的勝利點數。

Name: TutorialStep400_7
Text_English: Once prepared, press the Ready button to enter the arena.
Text_Korean:
檢查完裝備，鬆開手指，做好準備後，我應該按下
準備戰鬥按鈕嗎？

Name: TutorialStep400_8
Text_English: Here you can choose the heroes who will participate in the occupation war. Then choose a hero who will participate.
Text_Korean: 在這裡，你可以選擇一個英雄參加佔領戰爭。然後選擇一個英雄參加戰鬥。

Name: TutorialStep400_9
Text_English: It is better to experience the real thing than to say a hundred words! Press the <span color="#eec178">Battle Start </> button to enter the war!
Text_Korean: 經驗勝過一百個字！現在，按下<span color="#eec178">開始戰鬥</>按鈕加入戰鬥！

Name: TutorialStep400_11
Text_English: Before we begin the occupation war, I have a brief explanation. The stage you see in the center is the <span color="#eec178">base area that you should occupy with your colleagues.
Text_Korean: 在我們開始征服戰爭之前，我有一個簡單的解釋。您在中心看到的舞台是您和您的盟友需要佔領的<span color="#eec178">基地區域</>！

Name: TutorialStep400_12
Text_English: The team that occupies the base can get the <span color="#eec178">occupation point</>. The team with the occupied points <span color="#eec178">100%</> wins.
Text_Korean: 佔領基地的隊伍將獲得<span color="#eec178">佔領點</>。 <span color="#eec178">100%</> 控制點的團隊獲勝。

Name: TutorialStep400_13
Text_English: The Guardian <span color="#eec178"> appears in the center of the base area at a certain time during the battle. Do not forget that riding the Guardian <span color="#eec178"> will give the team a big advantage!
Text_Korean: 在戰鬥中，<span color="#eec178">守護者</>會定期從要塞中心出現。不要忘記<span color="#eec178">登入</> Guardians 為您的團隊帶來了巨大的優勢！

Name: TutorialStep400_15
Text_English: In <span color="#ec178">6am area </>, <span color="#ec178"><span color="#ec178">binding skill </>to recharge the gauge is created, which is very helpful in battle.
Text_Korean: 在基地區的<span color="#eec178">6點鐘區域</>，<span color="#eec178">綁定技能</><span color="#eec178">寶珠< /> 被創建並且在戰鬥中非常有幫助。

Name: TutorialStep400_17
Text_English: <span color="#eec178">12am </> in the base area will also create <span color="#eec178"> binding skill of </> so please take a closer look at the top and bottom!
Text_Korean: 基地區<span color="#eec178">12am</>也會創建</>的<span color="#eec178">綁定技能，所以請仔細看頂部和底部！

Name: TutorialStep400_19
Text_English: Now, let us get started with <span color="#eec178">Actual</>!
Text_Korean: 現在，讓我們開始<span color="#eec178">練習</>！

Name: TutorialStep400_21
Text_English: That's it. Now, go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean:
指揮和執行行動的能力是英雄應該具備的技能。
我期待你未來的表現。然後為下一次冒險做好準備。

Name: TutorialTitle500
Text_English: Item upgrade
Text_Korean: 設備設防

Name: TutorialDesc500
Text_English: 1-3 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-3 清除

Name: TutorialStep500_0
Text_English: Let's see what you can do with the upgrade scrolls. First, go to your inventory.
Text_Korean:
讓我告訴你關於Enhance，它會提高你的裝備屬性。
打開設備箱。

Name: TutorialStep500_1
Text_English: Press a weapon to open the Information menu.
Text_Korean: 你現在知道該怎麼做了，對吧？是的，您應該先查看<span color="#eec178">信息</>。選擇武器以查看<span color="#eec178">信息</>。

Name: TutorialStep500_2
Text_English: Press the Upgrade button.
Text_Korean: 它會讓你頭暈目眩，所以讓我們立即按下<span color="#eec178">增強按鈕</>。

Name: TutorialStep500_3
Text_English: Normal scrolls can increase the upgrade level up to 1, while rare scrolls can increase up to three levels.
Text_Korean:
對於普通增強滾動，最多1個，高級增強滾動最多
3個 你可以提高增強等級。

Name: TutorialStep500_4
Text_English: A guardian crystal can protect your item from losing upgrade levels when upgrade fails.
Text_Korean:
那是強化如果你不能很好地集中註意力，你可能會失敗。
屆時，如果有守護水晶，會防止等級降低。

Name: TutorialStep500_5
Text_English: Now, try to upgrade your equipment by using the weapon upgrade scroll.
Text_Korean: 那麼，有了這樣的解釋，我們是不是要用這具成熟之體準備的<span color="#eec178">設防書</>來<span color="#eec178">設防</>裝備？

Name: TutorialStep500_6
Text_English: Press the Upgrade button.
Text_Korean: 現在，讓我們專注於您的願望並按下<span color="#eec178">裝備增強按鈕</>！

Name: TutorialStep500_7
Text_English: Now, go back to the lobby and get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean:
好好。也成功。
別忘了佩戴增強型裝備。然後回去準備下一次冒險。

Name: TutorialTitle700
Text_English: PvP match
Text_Korean: 1:1 比賽

Name: TutorialDesc700
Text_English: 1-8 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-8 清除

Name: TutorialStep700_0
Text_English: If you want to fight other heroes, press the PvP button.
Text_Korean: 看起來你變強了很多，但你不想測試一下你的實力嗎？我們將引導您與其他英雄進行比賽。

Name: TutorialStep700_1
Text_English: Press Duel to enter.
Text_Korean: 比賽的舞台聚集於此。這次我們將介紹<span color="#eec178">1:1 match</>，所以請輸入<span color="#eec178">1:1 match</>。

Name: TutorialStep700_2
Text_English: You can check your rank information here. You can see your overall ranking and ranking among friends.
Text_Korean: 比賽中會缺少排名信息嗎？排名分為<span color="#eec178">綜合排名、好友排名</>，可以查看各個信息。

Name: TutorialStep700_3
Text_English: Seasonal rewards are provided every week. Try to increase your rank to get better rewards!
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178"><span color="#eec178">賽季獎勵</>每週<span color="#eec178">每週</>按等級分配，努力增加你的等級！

Name: TutorialStep700_4
Text_English: You can acquire promotion stones by winning duels.
Text_Korean: 在 1:1 的比賽中，您可以獲得 <span color="#eec178">經驗</> 和 <span color="#eec178">晉級石</> 用於每場胜利的排名提升。

Name: TutorialStep700_5
Text_English: Duel rewards are given according to wins before losing three times. Try to obtain higher win points!
Text_Korean: 3次失敗前獲得的勝利點數反映在<span color="#eec178">決鬥箱</>來決定獎勵，所以積累高勝利點數！

Name: TutorialStep700_6
Text_English: Once prepared, press the Ready button to enter the duel arena.
Text_Korean: 一切準備就緒後，您現在可以通過單擊 <span color="#eec178">準備戰鬥按鈕</>進入 1:1 比賽。

Name: TutorialStep700_7
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 所有的解釋都是完整的。我希望我不會在大田見到你。祝你一切順利。

Name: TutorialTitle800
Text_English: Promotion
Text_Korean: 晉升

Name: TutorialDesc800
Text_English: 1-8 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-8 清除

Name: TutorialStep800_0
Text_English: Let's see what you can do with the promotion stones. First, open the Hero menu.
Text_Korean:
現在輪到我解釋我羨慕什麼了。
請選擇綜合管理菜單，因為這是一種利用促銷石的方式。

Name: TutorialStep800_1
Text_English: Open the Promotion menu.
Text_Korean: 嗯，試試按 <span color="#eec178">Promote</>。

Name: TutorialStep800_2
Text_English: You can get new titles and additional stats through promotion.
Text_Korean: 當你<span color="#eec178">晉升</>通過加強你的排名，你會得到<span color="#eec178">stats</>和<span color="#eec178">Title</> .我真的很羨慕。

Name: TutorialStep800_3
Text_English: There are 10 points in each PvP rank. Continue your promotion sequence from currently active points.
Text_Korean: 每個等級之間有一個<span color="#eec178">15個步驟</>的過程，當您按下當前步驟的按鈕時，<span color="#eec178">Enhance</>會進行。

Name: TutorialStep800_4
Text_English: Collect promotion stones and gold to promote your PvP rank by participating in duels.
Text_Korean: 要提升等級，您需要在 1:1 對戰中獲得<span color="#eec178">金幣</>和<span color="#eec178">晉升石</>。贏得很多並節省很多。

Name: TutorialStep800_5
Text_English: You can easily upgrade by using auto promote.
Text_Korean: 如果您收集了很多資源，您可以使用<span color="#eec178">自動增強按鈕</>方便地進行操作。

Name: TutorialStep800_6
Text_English: That's it. Now, go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean:
你很快就會上升到我永遠無法超越的級別。
所有的解釋都是完整的。那我想請你幫個忙。

Name: TutorialTitle900
Text_English: Relics
Text_Korean: 古物

Name: TutorialDesc900
Text_English: 1-10 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-10 清除

Name: TutorialStep900_0
Text_English: Let's see what you can do with the hero stones. First, open the Hero menu.
Text_Korean: 和！你比第一個強很多。我不必要地擔心。請參閱 <span color="#eec178">Integrated Menu</> 了解重要說明。

Name: TutorialStep900_1
Text_English: Open the Relic menu.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">遠古遺跡</>可以通過在各個區域擊敗<span color="#eec178">boss</>獲得。輸入<span color="#eec178">古代遺物</>。

Name: TutorialStep900_2
Text_English: The first relic is enabled. Press it to open the Upgrade menu.
Text_Korean: 你擊敗了卡里古拉並獲得了<span color="#eec178">第一古物</>。選擇工件並瀏覽 <span color="#eec178">增強菜單</>。

Name: TutorialStep900_3
Text_English: Each relic has unique abilities. The higher its upgrade level, the stronger it gets.
Text_Korean: 古代神器與每個神器的<span color="#eec178">不同領域的能力</>相關聯。等級越高，相關領域的能力就越高。

Name: TutorialStep900_4
Text_English: You can use the hero shards to upgrade your relic. Don't forget that you can get them from the hero's tower!
Text_Korean: 您可以使用<span color="#eec178">英雄碎片</>來<span color="#eec178">增強</>。別忘了從<span color="#eec178">英雄之塔</>獲得英雄碎片！

Name: TutorialStep900_5
Text_English: Once you have the shards, you can start upgrading by pressing the Upgrade button.
Text_Korean: 準備好英雄作品後，您可以通過點擊下面的<span color="#eec178">增強按鈕</>對其進行升級。

Name: TutorialStep900_6
Text_English: Of course, there is also an auto upgrade option.
Text_Korean: 當然，您也可以通過點擊<span color="#eec178">自動增強按鈕</>輕鬆升級。

Name: TutorialStep900_7
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 我很抱歉一開始就忽略了你。我祝你在未來一切順利。

Name: TutorialTitle1000
Text_English: Hero's tower
Text_Korean: 英雄塔

Name: TutorialDesc1000
Text_English: 1-10 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 1-10 清除

Name: TutorialStep1000_0
Text_English: So you heard about the hero's tower. Press the Dungeon menu.
Text_Korean: 是時候迎接新的挑戰了。這是對古物的一項重要挑戰。轉到<span color="#eec178">挑戰菜單</>。

Name: TutorialStep1000_1
Text_English: Press Hero's Tower to enter.
Text_Korean: 它曾經是榮耀英雄儀式的光之象徵，但現在已被黑暗吞沒了<span color="#eec178">英雄之塔</>。請輸入。

Name: TutorialStep1000_2
Text_English: You are now at the tower's entrance. Here, you can check your progress.
Text_Korean:
這是塔的入口。您可以查看樓層信息的進度。
這仍然是開始，但我希望你爬到最後。

Name: TutorialStep1000_3
Text_English: Clearing each floor will give you hero shards.
Text_Korean: 當你重新佔領每一層時，你可以獲得<span color="#eec178">英雄的碎片</>，可以增強各種物品和古代神器。

Name: TutorialStep1000_4
Text_English: Once prepared, press the Ready button to enter the hero's tower.
Text_Korean: 現在，深呼吸並按下<span color="#eec178">準備戰鬥按鈕</>參與戰鬥以奪回塔樓。

Name: TutorialStep1000_5
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 解說完畢。英雄塔太高了，我的腿很痛，但這是我最喜歡的地方。請走到最後並重新拍攝。

Name: TutorialTitle1100
Text_English: Raid
Text_Korean: 襲擊

Name: TutorialDesc1100
Text_English: 2-4 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 2-4 清除

Name: TutorialStep1100_0
Text_English: A great darkness has been detected. Hurry and head to the Dungeon menu!
Text_Korean:
光明使者，你感受到強大的黑暗黎明了嗎？
挑戰挑戰一個巨大的敵人，讓黑暗的黎明安靜下來！

Name: TutorialStep1100_1
Text_English: Raid bosses only appear during certain periods so you must check. Now, press the Raid button.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">Raid boss</>會在你的暗能量滿時出現，所以請查看<span color="#eec178">出現時間</>。現在進入。

Name: TutorialStep1100_2
Text_English: Raid dungeons have easy, normal, and hard modes.
Text_Korean: 突襲分為<span color="#eec178">15級</>，級別越高，必須對付的黑暗勢力就越強大。

Name: TutorialStep1100_3
Text_English: You can select your character as required by the raid group.
Text_Korean: 您可以<span color="#eec178">選擇</><span color="#eec178">英雄</>來挑戰raid征服。如果最強的英雄參戰，豈不是很麻煩？

Name: TutorialStep1100_4
Text_English: Don't forget! Defeating the raid boss will give you trinkets that can increase your stats.
Text_Korean: 如果你成功征服了一個巨大的敵人，你可以獲得一個稀有的<span color="#eec178">飾品</>，所以不要忘記嘗試一下。

Name: TutorialStep1100_5
Text_English: If you create a raid group, you can invite friends to fight against the boss together.
Text_Korean: 如果您為討伐小隊創建房間，您可以<span color="#eec178">邀請</>您的朋友一起挑戰突襲老闆。

Name: TutorialStep1100_6
Text_English: Don't worry if you don't have enough friends. Quick start will automatically find a group for you!
Text_Korean: 如果您沒有朋友英雄，請不要哭泣。 <span color="#eec178">快速開始</>讓您與其他英雄一起玩。

Name: TutorialStep1100_7
Text_English: That's it. Now, go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 我期待在未來與其他英雄一起挑戰巨大的敵人。我們回大廳好嗎？

Name: TutorialTitle1200
Text_English: Counter dungeon
Text_Korean: 反擊地牢

Name: TutorialDesc1200
Text_English: 2-10 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 2-10 清除

Name: TutorialStep1200_0
Text_English: Let's head to the counter dungeons. Open the Dungeon menu.
Text_Korean: 是時候練習這個世界上非常重要的<span color="#eec178">反擊</>了。我會帶你去那個地方。嘗試按下 <span color="#eec178">挑戰按鈕</>。

Name: TutorialStep1200_1
Text_English: Press Counter Dungeon.
Text_Korean:
您必須應對許多挑戰。
選擇反擊地牢。

Name: TutorialStep1200_2
Text_English: You can earn special rewards by repeatedly clearing counter dungeons.
Text_Korean:
這是惡魔隱藏升級的地方。
我必須重新拍攝。由於這是一項重要的任務，我們提供參與獎勵。

Name: TutorialStep1200_3
Text_English: End the active counter dungeon of the day!
Text_Korean: 因為是黑暗的境界，需要打開時空的縫隙才能穿透，但每天都在變化。現在進入空地！

Name: TutorialStep1200_4
Text_English: There are easy, normal, and hard modes in counter dungeons.
Text_Korean:
根據風險等級分為15個難度級別。
難度越高，獎勵越大，挑戰越強。

Name: TutorialStep1200_5
Text_English: Different dungeons for different heroes open depending on the day.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">您可以選擇要挑戰的英雄</>。如果英雄屬性強，任務很容易完成。

Name: TutorialStep1200_6
Text_English: You can acquire enhancement stones by completing a counter dungeon. You need these stones to upgrade items!
Text_Korean:
如果任務成功，您可以獲得回收的升級座椅。
請務必參與，因為它是提升裝備等級的重要資源！

Name: TutorialStep1200_7
Text_English: You can enter by pressing the Battle Start button. Don't worry. If you lose, entry limits will not decrease.
Text_Korean:
您可以通過按開始戰鬥按鈕進入地牢。
如果任務失敗，參與次數不會被扣除。
不要害怕失敗！

Name: TutorialStep1200_8
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 您每天可以挑戰逆襲地牢<span color="#eec178">3次</>，所以不要錯過。那我們就準備下一場戰鬥吧。

Name: TutorialTitle1300
Text_English: Guild
Text_Korean: 公會

Name: TutorialDesc1300
Text_English: 3-10 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 3-10 清除

Name: TutorialStep1300_0
Text_English: I'll learn about the guild. Press the Integration Menu.
Text_Korean: 世界不能單獨保衛。我會告訴你關於<span color="#eec178">公會</>，一個有意志和意志的人的聚會。打開 <span color="#eec178">集成菜單</>。

Name: TutorialStep1300_1
Text_English: You can also grow stronger by interacting with other players. Press the Guild menu.
Text_Korean: 增加、與其他英雄互動、合作對你的發展有很大的幫助。 <span color="#eec178">選擇公會</>。

Name: TutorialStep1300_2
Text_English: You can join a guild if you don't have one yet. Check out some recommendations.
Text_Korean: 沒有加入公會的英雄可以在這裡自由加入公會。請參考<span color="#eec178">推薦公會</>。

Name: TutorialStep1300_3
Text_English: Next, let's see how you can create a guild. Press the Create button.
Text_Korean: 如果你想炫耀你的意志和意志，你可以自己創建一個公會。選擇 <span color="#eec178">創建公會</> 標籤。

Name: TutorialStep1300_4
Text_English: If you want to create a guild, you should first pick an insignia!
Text_Korean:
你必須決定一個字形，它是公會的象徵，就像旗幟一樣。
如果您遇到很多麻煩，請使用隨機生成。

Name: TutorialStep1300_5
Text_English: After choosing your insignia, enter the guild name you want to use.
Text_Korean: 一旦你決定了字形，我將創建一個<span color="#eec178">公會名稱</>。這比決定字形需要更多時間，對吧？

Name: TutorialStep1300_6
Text_English: Once done, you can create your guild by spending some gold.
Text_Korean: 一切準備就緒並支付<span color="#eec178">公會建立費</>後，就大功告成了。

Name: TutorialStep1300_7
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 您可以創建和領導公會，也可以與其他英雄合作。解釋完了，我們回去吧。

Name: TutorialTitle1400
Text_English: Wings
Text_Korean: 翅膀

Name: TutorialDesc1400
Text_English: 3-10 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 3-10 清除

Name: TutorialStep1400_0
Text_English: I can see that you are ready to get some new wings. Go to the Hero menu and open Wings.
Text_Korean: 看到光芒照耀著你，你似乎可以擁有<span color="#eec178">翅膀</>。嘗試打開 <span color="#eec178">集成菜單</>。

Name: TutorialStep1400_1
Text_English: Press the Wings button.
Text_Korean: 事實上，只有天使才能擁有翅膀，但你是擁有光之力量的英雄。我們要打開 <span color="#eec178">wings</> 嗎？

Name: TutorialStep1400_2
Text_English: Here, you can see information about your current wings. Someday, you can have better wings, just like mine.
Text_Korean: 這些是你得到的翅膀。您可以查看 <span color="#eec178">Level</> 和 <span color="#eec178">Status</>。相信它的翅膀會變得更加精彩。

Name: TutorialStep1400_3
Text_English: Wings can be upgraded to Level 10 by using magic crystals.
Text_Korean: 翅膀可以消耗<span color="#eec178">魔法水晶</>到<span color="#eec178">增強</>到<span color="#eec178">Level 10</></>我有它。在那之後，進化是可能的。

Name: TutorialStep1400_4
Text_English: You can do so by pressing the Upgrade button or the Auto Upgrade button.
Text_Korean: 如果您有足夠的資源，您可以使用 <span color="#eec178">Enhance Button</> 一次增強一個步驟或使用 <span color="#eec178">Auto Enhance Button</> 來增強多個級別。

Name: TutorialStep1400_5
Text_English: Now, let's learn about options. First, press the Locked Option button.
Text_Korean: 翅膀也有 <span color="#eec178">屬性</>。嘗試按下鎖定的 <span color="#eec178">選項圖標</>。當你看到被鎖住的東西時，你不想打開它嗎？

Name: TutorialStep1400_6
Text_English: You can acquire new options when you evolve your wings to a higher level.
Text_Korean:
然後你需要進化你的翅膀到更高的等級。
每次進化都可以獲得新選項。

Name: TutorialStep1400_7
Text_English: Let's return to the Wings menu.
Text_Korean: 我並不為此感到自豪，但我無法用我翅膀上的信息填充這個空間。那麼讓我們回到機翼信息，好嗎？

Name: TutorialStep1400_8
Text_English: Don't forget! Wings can affect your stats as much as it can change your appearance. Let's return to the lobby now.
Text_Korean:
翅膀不僅對外觀有巨大的影響，而且對能力也有很大的影響。
準備一場精彩的戰鬥，期待華麗的翅膀。

Name: TutorialTitle1500
Text_English: Elite Difficulty
Text_Korean: 精英難度

Name: TutorialDesc1500
Text_English: 5-10 Normal clear
Text_Korean: 正常 5-10 清除

Name: TutorialStep1500_0
Text_English:
You’ve defeated Nidhogg. You have certainly grown strong.
But something strange has happened. First, try pressing the Adventure button.
Text_Korean:
擊敗尼德霍格讓你變得非常強大。
但是現在發生了一些奇怪的事情。首先，嘗試按下 冒險按鈕。

Name: TutorialStep1500_1
Text_English: Enter <span color="#eec178">Act. 1-5 checkpoints </>.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">行動。通過 1-5 號門</>。

Name: TutorialStep1500_2
Text_English: The demons you defeated were resurrected with even greater power. Try pressing the <span color="#eec178">Elite Difficulty</>.
Text_Korean: 你擊敗的惡魔已經以更大的力量復活。嘗試按 <span color="#eec178">精英難度</>。

Name: TutorialStep1500_3
Text_English:
We’ve already lost Luemos. Select the
First Gate of Elite Luemos.
Text_Korean:
Ruemos 已經被盜了。選擇精英 Ruemos 的
First Gate。

Name: TutorialStep1500_4
Text_English: I don't know if I can call this hopeful, but starting from the elite difficulty, the <span color="#eec178">Ether</> with mysterious power can be found. Be sure to collect those.
Text_Korean: 我想說這是有希望的，但是從精英難度開始，已經發現了具有神秘力量的 <span color="#eec178">以太</>。確保你得到它

Name: TutorialStep1500_5
Text_English: Since we have to reclaim the first gate, press the <span color="#eec178">Ready button</> to prepare for battle with an even stronger force of darkness.
Text_Korean: 我們需要開始奪回第一道門，所以按下<span color="#eec178">準備戰鬥按鈕</>，準備與更強大的黑暗戰鬥。

Name: TutorialStep1500_6
Text_English: I’m sorry to ask you to engage in such difficult battles again, but only you can reclaim this world from the returning darkness. Please begin the reclamation.
Text_Korean: 我很抱歉要求再進行一場艱苦的戰鬥，但你是唯一能夠從復活的黑暗中恢復世界的人。讓重新捕獲開始。

Name: TutorialTitle1600
Text_English: Ether
Text_Korean: 醚

Name: TutorialDesc1600
Text_English: 1-1 Hard clear
Text_Korean: 精英 1-1 清除

Name: TutorialStep1600_0
Text_English: Press the Integration menu.
Text_Korean: 為了能夠使用 <span color="#eec178">Ether</>，Lightbringer 很強大。嘗試打開 <span color="#eec178">集成菜單</>。

Name: TutorialStep1600_1
Text_English: Enter the Ether menu!
Text_Korean: 我要告訴你的<span color="#eec178">以太</>是一種具有來歷不明的神秘力量的物質。那麼我們應該打開 <span color="#eec178">ether</> 嗎？

Name: TutorialStep1600_2
Text_English: I prepared the ether of the thunderbird for your hero. Touch to see the information.
Text_Korean: 被發現的以太種類並不多，它是一種正在被研究的物質。我已經為你準備了<span color="#eec178">深度電荷的以太</>，所以請觸摸它。

Name: TutorialStep1600_3
Text_English: You can check the ether's tier rating and set ability. The higher the tier, the higher the set ability.
Text_Korean:
Aether 有 Tier Rating 和 Set Stats。
等級越高，設定的統計數據越高。

Name: TutorialStep1600_4
Text_English: Here, you can check the ether of the ability.
Text_Korean: 您可以查看 Ether 的 <span color="#eec178">stats</>。還有更強大的以太，所以找到它們會有很大幫助。

Name: TutorialStep1600_5
Text_English: Press the Decompose button to receive an ether sculpt item.
Text_Korean: <span color="#eec178">溶解</> ether 創建 <span color="#eec178">ether fragment</> 可用作 <span color="#eec178">增強材料</> I能夠。

Name: TutorialStep1600_6
Text_English: Let's look at ether strengthening. Please press the Reinforcement button.
Text_Korean: 在研究分解的過程中，我們還發現了一種強化以太的方法。嘗試按 <span color="#eec178">增強按鈕</>。

Name: TutorialStep1600_7
Text_English: Through strengthening, you can increase your current stats.
Text_Korean: 我發現以太可以像裝備一樣被強化，如果你強化它，你的屬性就會增加。通過強化獲得更高的統計數據。

Name: TutorialStep1600_8
Text_English: To strengthen, we need a piece of ether obtained through decomposition.
Text_Korean: 以太可以被分解，這樣力量就不會發生碰撞，它可以用失去屬性的以太碎片來加強。

Name: TutorialStep1600_9
Text_English: You can press the Auto Enhance button for easier enhancement.
Text_Korean:
以太似乎是一種具有很強個性的物質。
幸運的是，如果你有足夠的耗材，自動增強是可能的。

Name: TutorialStep1600_10
Text_English: Let's go back to the locker by pressing the X button.
Text_Korean: 既然我已經告訴過你增強功能，讓我們回到庫存，好嗎？

Name: TutorialStep1600_11
Text_English: Finally, let's look at mounting. Touch the ether!
Text_Korean: 我們準備了一個可以在裝備時提取以太之力的裝置。那麼讓我們試試<span color="#eec178">equip</>？觸摸乙醚。

Name: TutorialStep1600_12
Text_English: Please press the Bottom Mount button!
Text_Korean: 按 <span color="#eec178">Mount 按鈕</>，它將安裝在適當的位置。按下。

Name: TutorialStep1600_13
Text_English: The ether is fits well! You can release all of the built-in ether via the Release All button.
Text_Korean:
做得好！現在將觸發以太效應。
按全部解鎖按鈕
禁用所有裝備的以太。

Name: TutorialStep1600_14
Text_English: Now, I am done will all the explanations. Go back to the lobby and get your reward!
Text_Korean:
我已經把我所知道的關於以太的一切都告訴了你。
我祈禱您找到強大的以太並驅除復活的黑暗。

Name: TutorialTitle1700
Text_English: Team match
Text_Korean: 團隊賽

Name: TutorialDesc1700
Text_English: 1-7 Hard clear
Text_Korean: 精英 1-5 清除

Name: TutorialStep1700_0
Text_English: Let's learn about team matches. Open the PvP menu.
Text_Korean: 你有沒有和你的冒險者同伴打過仗？然後告訴我。嘗試按下 <span color="#eec178">決鬥按鈕</>。

Name: TutorialStep1700_1
Text_English: Open Team Match.
Text_Korean: 我說的戰鬥是<span color="#eec178">團隊戰鬥</>。它也是檢查冒險夥伴之間協同作用的訓練場。

Name: TutorialStep1700_2
Text_English: You can check your rank information here. You can see your overall ranking and ranking among friends.
Text_Korean:
團隊比賽排名也分為整體和好友排名。
檢查每個信息，享受刺激和自豪。

Name: TutorialStep1700_3
Text_English: Seasonal rewards are provided every week. Increase your rank to get better rewards.
Text_Korean: 在<span color="#eec178">每週</>中，<span color="#eec178">賽季獎勵</>是根據排名排名發放的，所以盡量在賽季前盡可能的提升排名結束。

Name: TutorialStep1700_4
Text_English: You can acquire an ether by winning a team match.
Text_Korean: 每次獲勝，您都會獲得<span color="#eec178">經驗</>和<span color="#eec178">以太碎片</>，充滿神秘力量。 Aether 將由另一位朋友解釋。

Name: TutorialStep1700_5
Text_English: Match rewards are given according to wins before losing three times. So try to get higher win points!
Text_Korean: 組隊比賽的<span color="#eec178">決鬥箱</>也會獎勵3次輸球前獲得的勝利點數，盡量不要輸。

Name: TutorialStep1700_6
Text_English: Press the Ready button to enter team formation.
Text_Korean: 這是一場團隊戰，所以你需要戰略和戰術。所以<span color="#eec178">形成</>很重要。我們來看看球隊的陣型？按<span color="#eec178">準備戰鬥按鈕</>。

Name: TutorialStep1700_7
Text_English: Formation is an important factor for winning. You can upgrade formations accordingly.
Text_Korean: 考慮<span color="#eec178">形成</>、<span color="#eec178">選擇</>、<span color="#eec178">強化</>如果增加傷害效果，這將是有利的。

Name: TutorialStep1700_8
Text_English: Remember that you also need to position your heroes in formation.
Text_Korean: 選擇適合自己陣型的<span color="#eec178">英雄</>和<span color="#eec178">位置</>也是重要因素。它通常被稱為僱傭兵藝術。

Name: TutorialStep1700_9
Text_English: Once prepared, press the Ready button to enter the arena.
Text_Korean: 完成戰略戰術並查看英雄狀態後，點擊<span color="#eec178">開始戰鬥按鈕</>即可進入戰鬥。

Name: TutorialStep1700_10
Text_English: Go back to the lobby and get your reward. Get ready for the next battle.
Text_Korean: 現在沒有太多要告訴你的了。說明你成長了很多。繼續努力奮斗然後回去

Name: TutorialTitle1800
Text_English: Fairy
Text_Korean: 仙女

Name: TutorialDesc1800
Text_English: Nightmare 1-1 clear
Text_Korean: 清除噩夢 1-1

Name: TutorialStep1800_0
Text_English:
Do you know the special abilities of the fairies of the forest?
Please press the menu.
Text_Korean:
你知道森林精靈的特殊能力嗎？
點擊菜單。

Name: TutorialStep1800_1
Text_English:
Here you can ask the fairies for special blessings.Press
Fairy menu.
Text_Korean:
您可以在此處向仙女請求特別的祝福。
單擊仙女菜單。

Name: TutorialStep1800_2
Text_English:
Here you can find the Blessings that fairies can give you.
Experienced fairies can give more blessings.
Text_Korean:
你可以在這裡查看小仙女能給的祝福。
有經驗的小仙女可以給你更多的祝福。

Name: TutorialStep1800_3
Text_English:
Would you like to ask Nice for blessing?
There is only one blessing you can ask for now.
Would you like to choose?
Text_Korean:
我們要不要向尼斯祈求祝福？
我現在只能祈求一個祝福。
你想試試嗎？

Name: TutorialStep1800_4
Text_English: If you press <span color="#eec178">Blessing Request</>, Nice will bless you immediately.
Text_Korean: 按<span color="#eec178">請求祝福</>，Nice會立即給你祝福。

Name: TutorialStep1800_5
Text_English:
If the fairy level goes up, the effect of blessing will also improve.
Click the blessing icon to view more information.
Text_Korean:
隨著仙靈等級的提升，祝福的效果也隨之提升。
點擊祝福圖標查看詳細信息。

Name: TutorialStep1800_6
Text_English: Now I will tell you how to gain experience with fairies. Press <span color="#eec178">Level Up </>.
Text_Korean: 所以現在我將向你展示如何與仙女建立經驗。請點擊<span color="#eec178">升級</>。

Name: TutorialStep1800_7
Text_English: You can gain experience with special items that you can get by <span color="#eec178">disassembling the equipment. Once you have a certain experience, you can raise the level of <span color="#eec178"> of the fairies.
Text_Korean: 您可以通過<span color="#eec178">disassemble</>設備獲得特殊物品的經驗。通過積累一定的經驗，可以提昇仙女的<span color="#eec178">等級</>。

Name: TutorialStep1800_8
Text_English: If you take more chances, you'll be able to ask more fairies for blessings. Shall we go back to prepare for the adventure?
Text_Korean: 隨著您進行更多的冒險，您將能夠請求更多仙女的祝福。我們要不要回去準備再次冒險？

Name: TutorialTitle1900
Text_English: Imprint
Text_Korean: 雕刻

Name: TutorialDesc1900
Text_English: Nightmare 2-10. Clear
Text_Korean: 清除噩夢 2-10

Name: TutorialStep1900_0
Text_English:
Do you know that? I learned a new skill!
You can make your equipment stronger now!
Text_Korean:
你知道嗎我一直在學習新技術的事實！
現在您可以使您的裝備更強大！

Name: TutorialStep1900_1
Text_English:
This method is only possible for advanced equipment of 6 stars or higher.
I will especially lend you high-end equipment for the demonstration!
Text_Korean:
這是一個只有6星以上的高端裝備才能做到的秘密。
特意借給你高端裝備示範！

Name: TutorialStep1900_2
Text_English: Now select <span color="#eec178">Engraving</>.
Text_Korean: 現在嘗試選擇“<span color="#eec178">雕刻</>。

Name: TutorialStep1900_3
Text_English:
Basically, the equipment can be imprinted twice.
You can do it again after a little process, but it's very difficult....
Text_Korean:
基本上，設備可以雕刻兩次。
稍微加工一下就可以多做幾次，但是很棘手... .

Name: TutorialStep1900_4
Text_English:
Each slot has a different capability .
If the ability I have is not what I want, it is possible to add an imprint on top of the previous ability.
Text_Korean: 每個<span color="#eec178">slot</>可以雕刻的<span color="#eec178">stats</>是不同的，可以重新應用雕刻。

Name: TutorialStep1900_5
Text_English: Choose an imprint slot that is not yet available.
Text_Korean: 嘗試選擇尚不可用的雕刻槽。

Name: TutorialStep1900_6
Text_English:
The locked slot should be open.
It's not an easy process, but you'll never fail!
Text_Korean:
鎖定槽需要打開。
這不是一個簡單的過程，但你永遠不會失敗！

Name: TutorialStep1900_7
Text_English:
Okay. That's it for my explanation.
Let's go back to the equipment box!
Text_Korean:
統治者。我的解釋到此結束。
讓我們回到裝備箱！

Name: TutorialStep1900_8
Text_English:
Let's get on with your journey!
I'm always wishing you good luck!
Text_Korean:
所以，讓我們繼續你的旅程吧！
祝你好運！

Name: TutorialClaerNotice
Text_English:
{0} Tutorial Completed!
Compensation has been paid to the mailbox.
Text_Korean:
{0}教程完成！
獎勵已發送到您的郵箱。
